name: Alien: Isolated
description:
Aliens invaded your spacebase and Isolated the entire crew. Your goal is to gather the crew and escape the base with them using the escape ship (highlighted with white) while avoiding the aliens. Aliens can't see well in the dark so you have a chance to escape them if you turn off your flashlight. The ship self-destructs in 93 seconds.

Good luck, soldier! 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for TriJam #191 in 2:58:04. Any feedback is welcome!
